programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2818
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1025
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep107
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep253254
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep481
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home(M) Ep1314
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to supervise their sons and nephews to make it happen

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamus wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Return Of The One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Bayama Irukku
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhosh Prathap, Reshmi Menon, Kovai Sarala, Rajendran, Bharani, Jagan, Lollu Sabha Jeeva & Others

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.desc: The Apple Doesn't Fall Far From The Teacher - When a subway train goes off the tracks, Crockett volunteers to help the victims.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep8

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep9

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep10
programme.desc: A Little Change Might Do You Some Good - Charles and Nellie help an elderly patient and her developmentally disabled grandson.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep11
programme.desc: It Is What It Is, Until It Isn't - Crockett and Charles treat Justins gym buddy. Maggie and Will help a robbery-homicide suspect.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep13

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep14
programme.desc: On Days Like Today Silver Linings Become Lifelines - Crockett relies on O.R. 2.0 to save a construction workers severed hand.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep15

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari Ep5
programme.desc: An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africas greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Fly Free Ep6
programme.desc: Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Giant Creepy Crawlers Ep5
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Gros Morne Ep1
programme.desc: On the western coast of Newfoundland, Gros Morne National Park is a place of awe-inspiring natural beauty. Gros Morne is a paradise for hikers, with a Mars-like terrainthe result of an earth-fracturing collision of continents nearly 500 million years ago.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Teens, Tots and Tantrums Ep8
programme.desc: Its a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear - the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Fly Free Ep6
programme.desc: Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Teens, Tots and Tantrums Ep8
programme.desc: Its a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear - the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year and four seasons looks like for the wildest animals of Canadas East-Coast.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari Ep5
programme.desc: An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africas greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Camouflage and Colouration Ep6
programme.desc: Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Chile Ep2
programme.desc: Stretching more than 1,000 kilometers west of the Andes Mountains, the Atacama Desert is the worlds driest non-polar region. Here are ominous volcanoes, dramatic erupting geysers, and dazzling colonies of flamingos. And, because of its high altitude and lack of light pollution, Atacama is home to the worlds largest astronomical observatory.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Second Chances Ep9
programme.desc: Clara and baby Clarita are strong enough to move to Bangamat Island, but are met with a hostile reception. Kasper is ready to be released in the wild. And instant celebrity Taymur tries to make a new friend.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - March of the Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven Ep6
programme.desc: This episode explores Tanzania's Ngorongoro Crater. It looks at what lies within the craters walls and examines how the surrounding areas impact life within Ngorongoro.

programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 - Meet the Devils Ep1
programme.desc: For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials mealtime.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 - Young Devils Ep2
programme.desc: Tasmanian Devils might have the most infamous reputations of any of the countrys marsupials, but these spirited scrappers also have another side. Theyre committed parents and heroic defenders of their pouch-reared young.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. Theyve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for its wildlife.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhappy Unicorn - Cloppycorn is very upset unhappy because his special felt ball, Snuggleball, is missing. Noddy needs to investigate quickly! He follows the clues around Fable Forest and discovers that PatPat broke snuggleball by mistake when she rode over it with her scooter. Noddy asks PatPat to make a new snuggleball but Cloppycorn doesn't like it. It doesn't feel cuddly like his special toy. Clever Noddy asks everyone in Toyland to give the new snuggleball a big hug. When he takes the new snuggleball back to Cloppycorn it feels just as huggly and snuggly as the old ball. What a good idea, Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep38
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga. But as Lion so wisely points out Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep25
programme.desc: Drillasaurs - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep25
programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep25
programme.desc: Sacks O' Cash / Oh Give Me A Home - Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep51
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Bait / Crood Detente - After Womp is told he can't attend the upcoming school ceremony, Thunk makes it his personal mission to get Womp to pass every subject before the ceremony; When the Valleyites disagree with letting the Broods move to Ahhh! Valley, Grug throws a giant party to force them to become best friends

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep49
programme.desc: The Colony - Keith and Krolia discover troubling details about Lotor

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep50
programme.desc: The Black Paladins - When all the controls fail on the Castle Ship due to a virus, Pidge must step up to solve the problem before it's too late

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep23
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Two - When a mysterious goop gives Fearless Leader real life superpowers, Rocky and Bullwinkle must reprise their masked hero personas.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep24
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Three - The mystery goop strikes again when Rockys stress ball falls into a vat of goop, making it sentient and gigantic! Now the stress ball is bouncing through New York City, getting bigger and bigger.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep50
programme.desc: Peabody's Delivery / Joe Vs. The Peabody And Sherman - While trying to teach Sherman about patience, Peabody agrees not to open a special delivery until after the show. It proves to be easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep51
programme.desc: Seen It / Edgar Allan Poe - When an audience heckler calls out the show for having a stale formula, Peabody mixes things up and has disastrous results.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep9
programme.desc: Silly Collection/Hat Wars - Leaf has a collection of sand, but when Rocksy discovers the sand is sentient, she tries to rescue them. / Very Berry creates a new hat that everyone hates, except when Twig wears it. Berry becomes jealous of Twigs newly found attention and tries to steal her hat back.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep10
programme.desc: The Queen/A Mighty Arm - After a group of ants steal stuff from the Mighty Ones, including Rocksys hair, they must head underground to the creepy ant farm in order to confront the Queen Ant to get their stuff back. / When the Mighty Ones accidentally neglect Twig, they make it up to him by embarking on a dangerous adventure to scale a snowman so Twig can live out of his dream of becoming the arm of the Mighty Snow Wizard... which is not actually his dream at all.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer's Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticker Mystery - New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the sticker bandit a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep39
programme.desc: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue - You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stolen Treasure - The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isn't Tina the Terrible's galleon at all. It's the shadow of a toy ship! He works out that Pirate Stripes took the treasure so that they could go on a treasure hunt to look for it! Pirate Stripes apologises for taking the treasure and returns it. Pirate Captain tells her that they've had such fun hunting for the treasure that they should do it again! Well done, Noddy. You've saved the day!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King's Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep26
programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep26
programme.desc: Volcano - Ty and Revvit bravely stay behind to build and save their crater from a nearby volcano eruption, but D-Structsdoesn't want them to succeed

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep26
programme.desc: The Cloud / Booverty - Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep52
programme.desc: This Is An End Part 1 & 2 - With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Girls Night Out - Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore - When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Fire Safety / Castle Catastrophe - When the girls at school develop a crush on the Fire Marshall, Alvin decides to be a hero with disastrous results. // After causing an accident at a historic castle, Cheesy and Alvin must work as reenactors to pay for the damage.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Party Animals / Warren Seville - Alvin books the band at a birthday party only to discover they've been booked for the petting zoo, as the pets! // When Alvin tries to break Theodore's dependence on Talking Teddy, Theodore invents a new imaginary friend.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dad's Stache Stash / A Root Galoot - Cecil shows Patrick his mustache collection. // The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep242
programme.desc: FarmerBob - SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Hill Fu / Sun's Out, Fun's Out - It's the annual foam-fisted all-camp karate battle, and SpongeBob trains to beat the butt-kicking Sandy. // It's the hottest day of summer, but there's only one AC in the whole camp.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Scoop Snoop / Eye Can't - The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads. // Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Gown and Out / Breaking Dad - When Lola advances to a regional pageant she worries she could lose for the first time. // Dad has Mr. Grouse watch Lily while he goes to a concert but things quickly start to go wrong

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Stuntin' / Olly Olly Organ Free - Patrick gets a stunt double. // Patrick's organs leave his body in protest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Senior Discount - Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Tour Bus / Game Show - When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead. // Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Invader Dim / Getting Heated - Tara's pranks have gone too far and it's time for pay-back! // There's a heatwave and Sammy and Raj are over it. Luckily Sammy remembers he has two VIP passes to The Polar Palace!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep252
programme.desc: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns - Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out / Neptune's Ball - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors. // The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Biorpsgiving - Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Tron's robot family.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Po Who Cried Ghost - Po's worst childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with hopping ghosts!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Fortuneteller - Aang, Katara, and Sokka discover a village of people who are all reliant on a fortuneteller in their everyday lives but they are so reliant that they are blind to the immanent danger they are all in.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Action Reaction - Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when he's doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out its to free her brother Francis who happens to be a mind-jacked Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Sporty Parker / Hammy Time - Parker makes the Yellow Springs soccer team, which thrills Angus since he never had the chance to play growing up. // Parker brings home a hamster the Middlemost Post falls in love with, but this love quickly turns to jealousy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Return to Omashu - The kids return to Omashu so that Aang can learn Earthbending from King Bumi. But when they get there, they are shocked to find the city is now in Fire Nation hands. Despite the danger, Aang enters Omashu in search of King Bumi.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep204

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on whats relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Rediscovering China

programme.title: Dokumentari: Dari Tamu Ke Jalan Conlay #3 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Dokumentari mengenai "kraf tour" di tiga daerah di Utara dan Pantai Barat Sabah, iaitu Kudat, Kota Belud dan Tuaran. Dokumentari ini juga akan membawa penonton untuk mengenali lebih dekat etnik Rungus di Kudat, Bajau Samah dan Irranun di Kota Belud dan Dusun Lotud di Tuaran yang meneruskan pembuatan kraftangan peninggalan nenek moyang mereka sehingga berjaya menjadi usahawan kraf di bawah Kraftangan Malaysia.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After more than a month alone in the Tasmanian wilderness, the three remaining people have no idea how many people are still in the competition, nor how much longer their opponents might hang on for.

programme.title: Designing A Legacy Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Tim Ross looks at how architecture can help bring us together in a world where we increasingly seem divided. He uncovers a number of fascinating stories of Australians forming communities around good design.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.
